author: James Tanner
method: For the tapenade, place the garlic, olives and oil into a mini food processor and blend until smooth. For the Mediterranean-style salad, place all of the salad ingredients into a bowl and mix well. To serve, place the salad onto a plate with the tapenade drizzled over.
ingredients: 1 garlic clove, chopped,  50g/1Â¾oz black olives, stones removed,  2 tbsp olive oil,  2 tomatoes, chopped,  1 handful fresh parsley,  1 handful fresh basil, torn,  1 tsp balsamic vinegar ,  1 tbsp olive oil
